title: Executive Order 6690-Deferring Effective Date of Executive Order No. 6614, of February 26, 1934
content: Pursuant to the last paragraph of Executive Order No. 6614, of February 26, 1934, transferring the functions of the War Department pertaining to national cemeteries and memorials in Europe to the American Battle Monuments Commission, it is ordered that the effective date of the said Executive order be, and it is hereby, deferred until May 21, 1934.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6690-Deferring Effective Date of Executive Order No. 6614, of February 26, 1934 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362463
